name: Aboleth Transmutation
summary: You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters to mold the flesh of your ancestors.
description:
You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters (also known as aboleths) to mold the flesh of your ancestors. You can use this magic to transfigure other beings. You gain 3rd-level feet to fins and 2nd-level water breathing as arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.Traits

Azarketi: Amphibious humanoids who live among the seas of the Inner Sea region, said to have descended from the people of Azlant. Sometimes known as gillmen or Low Azlanti.

Azarketis craft and use these weapons.
